DESCRIPTION: Upload an image to imgur and receive a link.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}imgur** ~ uploads the attached image to imgur.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: There are two ways to use this command, with a URL or direct image upload through discord.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: If you're using URL, it needs to be a proper link to the image.
ALIASES: Imgur does not have any aliases.
INVALID_URL: The URL you provided is not a valid URL.
FAILED: Failed to upload the file to imgur, please try again.
LINK: â„¹ Â» This is your imgur link!: **{{link}}**
MISSING_PERMISSION: You do not have any permission to post images in this channel.
NO_INPUT: You did not upload any image. Please try again.
ALREADY_IMGUR: The url you gave appears to be an imgur link already? ðŸ˜• <{{url}}>
MISSING_URL: You did not provide a valid URL or a image attachment.
